conversation.speaker: SYSTEM
conversation.text: Given that you enjoy true crime genres and are fond of Ben Stiller, I'd recommend you consider watching "District 9" or "American Gangster." In District 9, Sharlto Copley delivers a compelling performance as an extraterrestrial refugee, while in American Gangster, Denzel Washington brings intensity to his portrayal of a powerful drug lord. Both films offer captivating narratives within the crime genre.
